Jogre bones

Advanced data
Item ID3125

Jogre bones are bones dropped by jogres, which give 15 Prayer experience when buried. This can be increased by offering the bones in different ways:

  • 45 XP when casting Sinister Offering.
  • 45 XP when offered at the Sacred Bone Burner after the appropriate faith level has been achieved.
  • 52.5 XP when offered at a gilded altar with two burners lit or at the Chaos Temple.
  • 60 XP when offered at the Ectofuntus in the form of jogre bonemeal.

They can be lit with a tinderbox at level 30 Firemaking to make burnt jogre bones, granting 90 Firemaking experience. Burnt jogre bones are used with karambwanji paste during the Tai Bwo Wannai Trio quest to make marinated j' bones.

If a player selects "light" without level 30 Firemaking, the player will receive the message "You need a firemaking level of 30 to burn Jogre bones. You could find some other way of burning them.", hinting that you need to use a furnace to make burnt jogre bones.

Players can cast the Superheat Item spell on jogre bones for 53 Magic, and 25 Cooking experience.

[[File:Jogre bones detail.png|left|140px]]
'''Jogre bones''' are bones dropped by [[jogre]]s, which give 15 [[Prayer]] experience when buried. This can be increased by offering the bones in different ways: 
* 45 XP when casting [[Sinister Offering]].
* 45 XP when offered at the [[Sacred Bone Burner]] after the appropriate faith level has been achieved.
* 52.5 XP when offered at a [[gilded altar]] with two burners lit or at the [[Chaos Temple (hut)|Chaos Temple]].
* 60 XP when offered at the [[Ectofuntus]] in the form of [[jogre bonemeal]].

They can be lit with a [[tinderbox]] at level 30 [[Firemaking]] to make [[burnt jogre bones]], granting 90 Firemaking experience. Burnt jogre bones are used with [[karambwanji paste]] during the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]] [[Quests|quest]] to make [[marinated j' bones]].

If a player selects "light" without level 30 Firemaking, the player will receive the message "You need a firemaking level of 30 to burn Jogre bones. You could find some other way of burning them.", hinting that you need to use a [[furnace]] to make burnt jogre bones.

Players can cast the [[Superheat Item]] spell on jogre bones for 53 [[Magic]], and 25 [[Cooking]] experience.
